com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.animation.Animation
      • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    SmartGroupActivity<AggregateClass>

    public static final class SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation
extends android.view.animation.Animation
    This is taken from the Android API Demos source code! An animation that rotates the view on the Y axis between two specified angles. This animation also adds a translation on the Z axis (depth) to improve the effect.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation

        public SmartGroupActivity.Rotate3dAnimation(float fromDegrees,
                                    float toDegrees,
                                    float centerX,
                                    float centerY,
                                    boolean isVertical,
                                    float depthZ,
                                    boolean reverse)
        Creates a new 3D rotation on the Y axis. The rotation is defined by its start angle and its end angle. Both angles are in degrees. The rotation is performed around a center point on the 2D space, defined by a pair of X and Y coordinates, called centerX and centerY. When the animation starts, a translation on the Z axis (depth) is performed. The length of the translation can be specified, as well as whether the translation should be reversed in time.
        Parameters:
        fromDegrees - the start angle of the 3D rotation
        toDegrees - the end angle of the 3D rotation
        centerX - the X center of the 3D rotation
        centerY - the Y center of the 3D rotation
        depthZ - the Z zoom effect factor
        reverse - true if the translation should be reversed, false otherwise
